record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - July 17, 2007)

[Page: S9531]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, if there is no further business today, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 5:09 p.m., adjourned until Thursday, July 19, 2007, at 10 a.m.
